about_the_game:
The world's realms have fallen apart, in need of a hero to harness the light of Harmonia and unite them once again. Join Bluma as she journeys to each of the elemental realms, solves puzzles, discovers secrets, and plants vegetables.

ADVENTURE AWAITS

Using the Bloom Bow, Bluma connects Harmonian flowers to create platforms for solving physics-based puzzles. These platforms combine with unique environmental mechanics in each realm, adding a layer of depth to your adventure.

UNITE HARMONIA

Long ago, the magical Greenhouse connected all 4 elemental realms: Crystal, Wind, Bubble, and Volcano. But eventually, the Harmonians started caring only for themselves, causing the Greenhouse to wither away and closing off the portals.

Legend has it that a magical hero who can travel between the realms will bring the Greenhouse back to life. By gathering portal seeds and planting them in the Greenhouse, Bluma can reopen the portals and allow all Harmonians to travel between the realms once again.

JOURNEY ACROSS REALMS

  • Charming low pressure puzzle platformer with no enemies or timers to worry about

  • Watch your garden grow as you plant portal seeds and collect secret butterflies to progress

  • Make friends along the way as you travel across 4 different unique realms

  • 6 Original soundtrack songs will accompany you on your journey
